The Role: At LLamasoft Federal, we want to create a world where all public sector organizations are empowered by excellent supply chains. This data scientist role will work on a client enterprise data science team to provide advanced statistical and modeling support, covering a wide range of operational and business needs focused on improving U.S. military transportation and logistics solutions. This position requires a data-driven, highly analytic mind for work in the Joint Distribution Process Analysis Center (JDPAC) at the United Stated Transportation Command (USTRANSCOM) at Scott Air Force Base.

Job Description:
  • Utilizes mathematical and statistical techniques, elements of operations research theory, engineering knowledge, and innovative efforts to develop data science solutions
  • Maintains an up-to-date knowledge of enterprise data science and related technology trends
  • Performs a broad range of operations research analyses assignments entailing unique problems, advanced approaches, and/or new technologies
  • Trains others to apply created mathematical/statistical models within specific business processes
  • Utilizes scientific inquiry in the independent development of mathematical models and computer programs to evaluate and support assigned projects, studies, or problems
  • Simplifies, explains, and communicates complex data science concepts and advanced statistical models while presenting analytical results and providing business oriented recommendations
The Qualifications:
  • US citizenship and the ability to obtain a security clearance required (active DOD clearance a plus)
  • Bachelor's degree (Masters or higher preferred) from an accredited college or university in Data Science, Data Analytics, Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or related quantitative field
  • Strong database skills with experience in or knowledge of supply chain planning and design
  • Experience with operations research, data mining, machine learning, and statistical modeling, with 2 years experience (5 years preferred) using tools such as R, Python, SQL, Matlab, SPSS, or SAS
  • Familiarity with planning, forecasting, transportation, inventory management, and strategic sourcing
  • Demonstrated skills in solving problems, troubleshooting, and ensuring customer satisfaction
  • Experience with effectively prioritizing workload to meet deadlines and work objectives
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with an ability to work in a team environment with frequent customer contact
About LLamasoft

LLamasoft provides software and expertise to help companies design and improve their supply chain operations. We enable companies to model, optimize and simulate their supply chain operations, leading to major improvements in cost, service, sustainability, and risk mitigation. Supply Chain Guru®, LLamasofts flagship product, is the leading supply chain design and predictive analytics application available in the market today.

Since 1999, LLamasoft has helped hundreds of global organizations in over 30 countries leverage their unique blend of technology and deep domain expertise to drive competitive advantage and savings across their supply chain operations.

LLamasoft offers a stimulating small company atmosphere where your efforts will have a significant impact on global logistics and our companys success. We are a fun, results-driven company that centers on developing high quality software, not work schedules and dress codes. We are driven by people who have a passion for technology and innovation. If you are excited about software development and looking for a fun and flexible environment in a growing company, please apply!

To apply for this position, please visit our online application portal at: http://www.llamasoft.com/careers.html
